summary: The petrol pumps in the Capital reopened after the release of two petroleum workers on Sunday. In the talks held with agitating Petroleum Workers Union, the Department of Commerce agreed to release the arrested workers. Earlier in the day, Petroleum Workers Union decided to shut down the fuel stations to protest the arreste of their fellow workers. The petroleum workers enforced shutdown of petrol pumps from Sunday demanding immediate release of their fellow workers.
title: petrol-pumps-reopen-after-release-of-arrestees
